title: Spider Riders: Yomigaeru Taiyou (Spider Riders: Resurrected Sun)
synopsis: The battle against the Insectors to save the Inner World rages on, as Hunter Steele and the Spider Riders defend Arachna. With the help of his friends—Igneous, an intelligent young royal officer of Arachna's military; Magma, a foolhardy warrior; and Corona, a kind-hearted girl—crisis has been averted—but not for long.
voices: ['Kumai, Motoko', 'Chiba, Saeko', 'Kondou, Takashi', 'Shimizu, Kaori', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Kobayashi, Sanae', 'Higa, Kumiko', 'Kotani, Kinya', 'Katsu, Anri', 'Miyake, Kenta']
